meanings.definition: Excessive indulgence in something, especially food or drink.
meanings.sent1: Her overindulgence in sweets led to a stomachache.
meanings.sent2: His overindulgence in alcohol caused him to feel sick.
meanings.sent3: The overindulgence in cake at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His overindulgence in desserts was like a flood of sugar in his body.
meanings.sent5: The overindulgence in treats was a colorful display of gluttony.

meanings.definition: The act of indulging excessively in something.
meanings.sent1: Their overindulgence in shopping led to a huge credit card bill.
meanings.sent2: The overindulgence in screen time affected his sleep schedule.
meanings.sent3: The overindulgence in gossip made the conversation lively.
meanings.sent4: Her overindulgence in compliments was like a shower of praise.
meanings.sent5: The overindulgence in laughter filled the room with joy.
